item.description:
Idea suggested by member Brian Marazzi. Posted as FYI for group members.

On Saturday April 17th the Hamden/North Haven YMCA will be conducting a 3 mile Road Race and 2 Mile Family Fitness Walk.

11:00 am Registration opens
1:00 pm 2 Mile Family Fitness Walk
1:30 pm 3 Mile Road Race

Preregistration fee is $20 for runners and $15 for walkers; day of registration is $25 for runners and $20 for walkers. You can download a race application at www.hnhymca.org.
item.name: Hamden/North Haven YMCA Healthy Kids Day 3 Mile Road Race
